verses.verse: וַיְהִ֕י <S%H1961><s%> vay-Hi came כִּשְׁמֹ֖עַ <S%H8085><s%> kish-Mo-a' had heard יָבִ֣ין <S%H2985><s%> ya-Vin And it came to pass when Jabin מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> Me-lech- king חָצ֑וֹר <S%H2674><s%> cha-Tzor; of Hazor וַיִּשְׁלַ֗ח <S%H7971><s%> vai-yish-Lach, [those things] that he sent אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to יוֹבָב֙ <S%H3103><s%> yo-Vav to Jobab מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> Me-lech king מָד֔וֹן <S%H4068><s%> ma-Don, of Madon וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> ve-'el- and to מֶ֥לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> Me-lech and to the king שִׁמְר֖וֹן <S%H8110><s%> shim-Ron of Shimron וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> ve-'el- and to מֶ֥לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> Me-lech and to the king אַכְשָֽׁף׃ <S%H407><s%> 'ach-Shaf. of Achshaph

וְֽאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> ve-'el- and to הַמְּלָכִ֞ים <S%H4428><s%> ham-me-la-Chim And to the kings אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher who מִצְּפ֗וֹן <S%H6828><s%> mitz-tze-Fon, that [were] on the north בָּהָ֧ר <S%H2022><s%> ba-Har of the mountains וּבָעֲרָבָ֛ה <S%H6160><s%> u-va-'a-ra-Vah and of the plains נֶ֥גֶב <S%H5045><s%> Ne-gev south כִּֽנֲר֖וֹת <S%H3672><s%> ki-na-Rot of Chinneroth וּבַשְּׁפֵלָ֑ה <S%H8219><s%> u-vash-she-fe-Lah; and in the valley וּבְנָפ֥וֹת <S%H5299><s%> u-ve-na-Fot and in the borders דּ֖וֹר <S%H1756><s%> Dor of Dor מִיָּֽם׃ <S%H3220><s%> mi-Yam. on the west

הַֽכְּנַעֲנִי֙ <S%H3669><s%> hak-ke-na-'a-Ni [And to] the Canaanite מִמִּזְרָ֣ח <S%H4217><s%> mi-miz-Rach on the east וּמִיָּ֔ם <S%H3220><s%> u-mi-Yam, and on the west וְהָאֱמֹרִ֧י <S%H567><s%> ve-ha-'e-mo-Ri and [to] the Amorite וְהַחִתִּ֛י <S%H2850><s%> ve-ha-chit-Ti and the Hittite וְהַפְּרִזִּ֥י <S%H6522><s%> ve-hap-pe-riz-Zi and the Perizzite וְהַיְבוּסִ֖י <S%H2983><s%> ve-hay-vu-Si and the Jebusite בָּהָ֑ר <S%H2022><s%> ba-Har; in the mountains וְהַֽחִוִּי֙ <S%H2340><s%> ve-ha-chiv-Vi and [to] the Hivite תַּ֣חַת <S%H8478><s%> Ta-chat the foot חֶרְמ֔וֹן <S%H2768><s%> cher-Mon, under Hermon בְּאֶ֖רֶץ <S%H776><s%> be-'E-retz in the land הַמִּצְפָּֽה׃ <S%H4709><s%> ham-mitz-Pah. of Mizpeh

וַיֵּצְא֣וּ <S%H3318><s%> vai-ye-tze-'U And they went out הֵ֗ם <S%H1992><s%> Hem, they וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> ve-chol and all מַֽחֲנֵיהֶם֙ <S%H4264><s%> ma-cha-nei-Hem they and all their hosts עִמָּ֔ם <S%H5973><s%> 'im-Mam, with עַם־ <S%H5971><s%> 'am- people רָ֕ב <S%H7227><s%> rav with them much כַּח֛וֹל <S%H2344><s%> ka-Chol even as the sand אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher after עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- and שְׂפַת־ <S%H8193><s%> se-fat- shore הַיָּ֖ם <S%H3220><s%> hai-Yam that [is] upon the sea לָרֹ֑ב <S%H7230><s%> la-Ro; in multitude וְס֥וּס <S%H5483><s%> ve-Sus with horses וָרֶ֖כֶב <S%H7393><s%> va-Re-chev and chariots רַב־ <S%H7227><s%> rav- many מְאֹֽד׃ <S%H3966><s%> me-'Od. very
